title: Covid-19 vaccines: Priorities, processes and practicalities
description: By Assoc Prof Benjamin Ong Kian Chung, NUS Senior Vice President (Health Education & Resources) and Senior Adviser to the Director of Medical Services at the Ministry of Health (MOH), and Assoc Prof Lim Poh Lian, Head of the Travellers' Health and Vaccination Clinic at Tan Tock Seng Hospital and Senior Consultant at the National Centre for Infec...
cleaned_text: Covid-19 vaccines: Priorities, processes and practicalities By Assoc Prof Benjamin Ong Kian Chung, NUS Senior Vice President (Health Education & Resources) and Senior Adviser to the Director of Medical Services at the Ministry of Health (MOH), and Assoc Prof Lim Poh Lian, Head of the Travellers' Health and Vaccination Clinic at Tan Tock Seng Hospital and Senior Consultant at the National Centre for Infectious Diseases. Assoc Prof Ong and Assoc Prof Lim are also respectively Chairperson and Member of the expert committee on Covid-19 vaccination
